snippet: The Federal Reserve should not be the only one doing battle for the economy. It said it saw signs of improvement, but more help is needed from Congress and the White House, too.
abstract: Editorial contends the United States economy still needs help from Congress and the White House, despite the Federal Reserve's plans to keep borrowing costs low; highlights some economic areas that should be monitored.
lead_paragraph: The Federal Reserve should not be the only one doing battle for the economy. It said it saw signs of improvement, but more help is needed from Congress and the White House, too.
